Detailed Description

Include file for NDK NIMU transport driver interface for ICSS.

Macro Definition Documentation

#define NIMU_ICSS_MAX_MCAST   ((uint32_t)31U)

Multicast Address List Size

#define NIMU_ICSS_PKT_PREPAD   ((uint32_t)0U)

Pre-Pad Packet Data Offset The TCP/IP stack library requires that every packet device include enough L2 header room for all supported headers. In order to support PPPoE, this requires a 22 byte L2 header. Thus, since standard Ethernet is only 14 bytes, we must add on an additional 8 byte offset, or PPPoE can not function with our driver.

NIMU_ICSS Driver Status.

Enumerator
NIMU_STAT_UNKNOWN

NIMU_STAT_DOWN 

NDK driver is not up

NIMU_STAT_UP 

NDK driver is up

NIMU_STAT_PROGRESS 

Driver init in progress

Function Documentation

The EMAC Initialization Function.

The function is used to initialize and register the EMAC with the Network Interface Management Unit (NIMU)
